#!/bin/sh
#
# yes | ./StringRefBug.txt

# The array generated by split is broken??
#


tawk '
BEGIN {
    __N_Markup_Bins = split("0", __Markup_Bins, " ")

    for ( __i = 1; __i <= __N_Markup_Bins; __i++ ) {
	 __Markup_Bins[__i] = __Markup_Bins[__i] + 0.0
    }
}

{
    for ( __i = 1; __i <= __N_Markup_Bins; __i++ ) {
	 Markup_Bin = __Markup_Bins[__i]
    }

    __Rows[++N] = Markup_Bin
} '
